OrganizationEvent

Triggered when a user is created, deleted, added, removed, or invited to an Organization. Global webhooks will only receive notifications when an organization is created and deleted. Organization webhooks will receive notifications for deleted, added, removed, and invited events.

Events of this type are not visible in timelines. These events are only used to trigger organization hooks.

Events API payload

Key Type Description
action string The action that was performed. Can be one of: created, deleted, member_added, member_removed, or member_invited.
invitation object The invitation for the user or email if the action is member_invited.
membership object The membership between the user and the organization. Not present when the action is member_invited.
organization object The organization in question.

Webhook event name

organization

Webhook payload example

{
  "action": "member_added",
  "membership": {
    "url": "http://octocoders.github.io/api/v3/orgs/Octocoders/memberships/Hacktocat",
    "state": "active",
    "role": "member",
    "organization_url": "http://octocoders.github.io/api/v3/orgs/Octocoders",
    "user": {
      "login": "Hacktocat",
      "id": 5,
      "avatar_url": "http://octocoders.github.io/avatars/u/5?",
      "gravatar_id": "",
      "url": "http://octocoders.github.io/api/v3/users/Hacktocat",
      "html_url": "http://octocoders.github.io/Hacktocat",
      "followers_url": "http://octocoders.github.io/api/v3/users/Hacktocat/followers",
      "following_url": "http://octocoders.github.io/api/v3/users/Hacktocat/following{/other_user}",
      "gists_url": "http://octocoders.github.io/api/v3/users/Hacktocat/gists{/gist_id}",
      "starred_url": "http://octocoders.github.io/api/v3/users/Hacktocat/starred{/owner}{/repo}",
      "subscriptions_url": "http://octocoders.github.io/api/v3/users/Hacktocat/subscriptions",
      "organizations_url": "http://octocoders.github.io/api/v3/users/Hacktocat/orgs",
      "repos_url": "http://octocoders.github.io/api/v3/users/Hacktocat/repos",
      "events_url": "http://octocoders.github.io/api/v3/users/Hacktocat/events{/privacy}",
      "received_events_url": "http://octocoders.github.io/api/v3/users/Hacktocat/received_events",
      "type": "User",
      "site_admin": false
    }
  },
  "organization": {
    "login": "Octocoders",
    "id": 6,
    "url": "http://octocoders.github.io/api/v3/orgs/Octocoders",
    "repos_url": "http://octocoders.github.io/api/v3/orgs/Octocoders/repos",
    "events_url": "http://octocoders.github.io/api/v3/orgs/Octocoders/events",
    "hooks_url": "http://octocoders.github.io/api/v3/orgs/Octocoders/hooks",
    "issues_url": "http://octocoders.github.io/api/v3/orgs/Octocoders/issues",
    "members_url": "http://octocoders.github.io/api/v3/orgs/Octocoders/members{/member}",
    "public_members_url": "http://octocoders.github.io/api/v3/orgs/Octocoders/public_members{/member}",
    "avatar_url": "http://octocoders.github.io/avatars/u/6?",
    "description": ""
  },
  "sender": {
    "login": "Codertocat",
    "id": 4,
    "avatar_url": "http://octocoders.github.io/avatars/u/4?",
    "gravatar_id": "",
    "url": "http://octocoders.github.io/api/v3/users/Codertocat",
    "html_url": "http://octocoders.github.io/Codertocat",
    "followers_url": "http://octocoders.github.io/api/v3/users/Codertocat/followers",
    "following_url": "http://octocoders.github.io/api/v3/users/Codertocat/following{/other_user}",
    "gists_url": "http://octocoders.github.io/api/v3/users/Codertocat/gists{/gist_id}",
    "starred_url": "http://octocoders.github.io/api/v3/users/Codertocat/starred{/owner}{/repo}",
    "subscriptions_url": "http://octocoders.github.io/api/v3/users/Codertocat/subscriptions",
    "organizations_url": "http://octocoders.github.io/api/v3/users/Codertocat/orgs",
    "repos_url": "http://octocoders.github.io/api/v3/users/Codertocat/repos",
    "events_url": "http://octocoders.github.io/api/v3/users/Codertocat/events{/privacy}",
    "received_events_url": "http://octocoders.github.io/api/v3/users/Codertocat/received_events",
    "type": "User",
    "site_admin": false
  }
}
